Uncharted 3: Drake's Deception™ RPG
kDesc
Every time you look at this RPG Wall Art, you'll remember how you beat Wave 2. [#Legal]
Chaque fois que vous regarderez cette affiche de lance-roquettes, vous vous souviendrez du jour où vous avez éliminé la vague 2. [#Legal]
Jedes Mal, wenn du diese Panzerfaust-Wandkunst betrachtest, wirst du dich daran erinnern, wie du Welle 2 besiegt hast. [#Legal]
Quando osserverai questa decorazione con RPG, ti ricorderai di come hai sconfitto la seconda ondata. [#Legal]
Cada vez que veas este mural de RPG, te acordarás de cómo superaste la oleada 2. [#Legal]
*Not Localised* RPG [#Legal]
RPG 벽 장식을 볼 때마다 당신이 어떻게 웨이브 2를 완료했는지 기억날 겁니다. [#Legal]
Every time you look at this RPG Wall Art, you'll remember how you beat Wave 2. [#Legal]
每次你看著這幅RPG壁飾，便會想起你如何完成第2關。 [#Legal]
每次你看著這幅RPG壁飾，便會想起你如何完成第2關。 [#Legal]
Every time you look at this RPG Wall Art, you'll remember how you beat Wave 2. [#Legal]
